- Blue cube blocks on top of a green platform

content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

## Structure Overview
The target structure resembles a colorful play set with multiple components:
- Total blocks: Approximately 20-22 building blocks
- Layers: 3 main layers (base, middle, top)
- Design features: Two tunnel/arch sections, a house-like structure with triangular roof pieces, and a platform with blue blocks

## Spatial Relationships
- Base layer: Yellow cubes and blocks form the foundation, with red tunnel pieces (with circular openings)
- Middle layer: Green rectangular blocks as platforms, with orange triangular pieces forming the roof sections
- Top layer: Blue cubic blocks on the right side, and a blue cube with orange roof triangles on the left

# Required Blocks from Dictionary

Looking at the block dictionary, I need the following blocks:

1. Red tunnel/arch blocks (indices 2 and 3) - for the tunnel sections
2. Blue cubes (index 4) - for the top section and platform
3. Green cubes and rectangles (indices 5, 7, 9) - for the middle platforms and walls
4. Yellow cubes and rectangles (indices 6, 10, 11, 12) - for the base foundation
5. Orange triangular roof pieces (indices 13, 15, 16) - for the roof structures
6. Orange cube (index 14) - for part of the structure

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 6
    Step2: Move block with index 6
    Step3: Move block with index 10
    Step4: Move block with index 12
    Step5: Move block with index 11
    Step6: Move block with index 3
    Step7: Move block with index 2
    Step8: Move block with index 5
    Step9: Move block with index 7
    Step10: Move block with index 9
    Step11: Move block with index 14
    Step12: Move block with index 13
    Step13: Move block with index 15
    Step14: Move block with index 16
    Step15: Move block with index 4
    Step16: Move block with index 4
    Step17: Move block with index 4
}
```

This assembly order starts with the base yellow foundation, adds the tunnel sections, builds up the green platforms, adds the orange roof pieces, and finally places the blue cubes at the top.
